name: Homestay at Coconut Homeland
description: Explore the coconut homeland, Ben Tre City, along Mekong River with the friendliest host in town. You stay in my grandfather's house, an ancient house which already has >50 years of history, try our homemade and garden growth food, simply organic and extremely tasty. Watch fireflies at night, pick up pomelo, papaya, collect chicken's eggs or get on a boat ride and watch the sunset, you'll fall in love with this place like me.
